entry.value: #libraries%%00010library(plotly)%%00010library(gprofiler2)%%00010%%00010# data input - GENE names column %%00010data <-as.data.frame(knime.in, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)%%00010# convert gene names from factors (default by R) to strings%%00010data[] <- lapply(data, as.character)%%00010%%00010# take only the first value before the delimiter; convert it to strings%%00010delimiter <- knime.flow.in[["delimiter"]]%%00010gene_names <- as.data.frame(sapply(strsplit(data[,1], delimiter), '[', 1))%%00010gene_names[] <- lapply(gene_names, as.character)%%00010colnames(gene_names) <- c("GENE_NAME")%%00010%%00010# organism%%00010organism_input <- knime.flow.in[["organism"]]%%00010%%00010# run gene ontology%%00010gene_ontology <- gost(gene_names$GENE_NAME, organism = organism_input , ordered_query = FALSE,%%00010 multi_query = FALSE, significant = TRUE, exclude_iea = TRUE,%%00010 measure_underrepresentation = FALSE, evcodes = FALSE,%%00010 user_threshold = 0.05, correction_method = c("g_SCS", "bonferroni",%%00010 "fdr", "false_discovery_rate", "gSCS", "analytical"),%%00010 domain_scope = c("annotated"), custom_bg = NULL,%%00010 numeric_ns = "", sources = NULL)%%00010%%00010

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
